# OPENAPI

## Linters

| Linter                                                                            | Additional                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [**spectral**](openapi_spectral.md)<br/>[_OPENAPI_SPECTRAL_](openapi_spectral.md) | ![deprecated](https://shields.io/badge/-deprecated-red) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/stoplightio/spectral?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/stoplightio/spectral) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.yml`
  - `.yaml`
  - `.json`

- Detected file content:
  - `"openapi":`
  - `"swagger":`
  - `openapi:`
  - `swagger:`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                     | Description                                     | Default value |
|------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|---------------|
| OPENAPI_PRE_COMMANDS         | List of bash commands to run before the linters | None          |
| OPENAPI_POST_COMMANDS        | List of bash commands to run after the linters  | None          |
| OPENAPI_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter                   |               |
| OPENAPI_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter                   |               |
